column2: Cork parked his Bronco behind the Aurora Middle School and headed toward the back entrance
column3: which was near a Dumpster. He could see that Deputy Gil Singer had been posted at the door.

column2:
Ethan was suddenly aware he was looking at the wall clock; it was 7:35.
“Wait a minute. When did you hear about this?”
There was a tiny moment of hesitation. “The first news came in just before five.”
